pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.utils

Interface BookServiceUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookServiceUtilsImpl

    public interface BookServiceUtils
    Interface used to perform operations for book service classes.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BorrowedBook createBorrowedBook(Book tempBook, User tempUser)
      Creates and returns the BorrowedBook object with given parameters.
      void prepareBookToSave(Book tempBook)
      Sets the new date of added and isActive and isAvailable status to TRUE
      void prepareBookToUpdate(Book tempBook, Book book)

    • Method Detail

      • createBorrowedBook

        BorrowedBook createBorrowedBook(Book tempBook,
                                User tempUser)
        Creates and returns the BorrowedBook object with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        tempBook - The Book containing the book associated with the BorrowedBook
        tempUser - The User containing the user associated with the BorrowedBook
        Returns:
        A BorrowedBook representing the BorrowedBook with given parameters

      • prepareBookToUpdate

        void prepareBookToUpdate(Book tempBook,
                         Book book)
        Updates the book with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        tempBook - The Book to be updated
        book - The Book containing the information using to update

      • prepareBookToSave

        void prepareBookToSave(Book tempBook)
        Sets the new date of added and isActive and isAvailable status to TRUE
        Parameters:
        tempBook - The Book containing the book to be updated
